Package net.sf.jguiraffe.gui.builder.di.tags

Class TestInvocationTags

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jguiraffe.gui.builder.di.tags.TestInvocationTags
  • public class TestInvocationTags
extends Object
    A test class for the tags creating invocation objects and related helper tags.
    Version:
    $Id: TestInvocationTags.java 207 2012-02-09 07:30:13Z oheger $
    Author:
    Oliver Heger

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void setUp()  
      void testConstructorInvocationClass()
      Tests a constructor invocation when the target is directly specified.
      void testConstructorInvocationClassName()
      Tests a constructor invocation when the target class is specified by name.
      void testConstructorInvocationNoTargetClass()
      Tests a ConstructorInvocationTag when no target class is specified.
      void testInvocationNoParams()
      Tests an invocation tag that does not have any parameters.
      void testInvocationNoSupport()
      Tests an invocation tag without an enclosing InvokableSupport tag.
      void testMethodInvocation()
      Tests a valid MethodInvocationTag.
      void testMethodInvocationNoMethod()
      Tests a MethodInvocationTag when no method name is specified.
      void testMethodInvocationNoParamTypes()
      Tests an invocation when no parameter types are specified.
      void testMethodInvocationSourceNoChain()
      Tests a method invocation tag with specified source and result attributes if no chain is in the context.
      void testMethodInvocationSourceWithChain()
      Tests an invocation with specified source and result attributes.
      void testMethodInvocationStatic()
      Tests a static method invocation.
      void testMethodInvocationStaticNoParamTypes()
      Tests a static method invocation when no parameter types are specified.
      void testMethodInvocationTargetDependency()
      Tests whether a target dependency is correctly handled.
      void testParameterTagWithoutInvocation()
      Tries to execute a parameter tag that is not nested inside an invocation tag.

                                       throws org.apache.commons.jelly.JellyTagException

        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.jelly.JellyTagException

      • testInvocationNoSupport

        public void testInvocationNoSupport()
                             throws org.apache.commons.jelly.JellyTagException
        Tests an invocation tag without an enclosing InvokableSupport tag. This should cause an exception.
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.jelly.JellyTagException

      • testMethodInvocationSourceNoChain

        public void testMethodInvocationSourceNoChain()
                                       throws org.apache.commons.jelly.JellyTagException
        Tests a method invocation tag with specified source and result attributes if no chain is in the context. This should cause an exception.
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.jelly.JellyTagException
